attributes.title: Chapter 1
attributes.caption: Don't Get Me Started
attributes.description: Sarge tries to make contact with someone from blue base.

attributes.title: Chapter 2
attributes.caption: Free Refills
attributes.description: Simmons uses the holo-room to continue his design work while Caboose continues his own mysterious project at Blue Base.

attributes.title: Chapter 3
attributes.caption: Visiting Hours
attributes.description: Caboose gets a visitor while the Reds look for their missing teammate.

attributes.title: Chapter 4
attributes.caption: Catching Up
attributes.description: Donut fills in Caboose with loads of rock-hard info. Tons of hot backstory action with an explosive, yet happy ending. Rated E for Everyone.

attributes.title: Chapter 5
attributes.caption: Local Host
attributes.description: Caboose looks for alternative solutions to his construction problems.

attributes.title: Chapter 6
attributes.caption: One New Message
attributes.description: Caboose's project moves to the next level.

attributes.title: Chapter 7
attributes.caption: Bon Voyage
attributes.description: The guys try not to get in over their heads as they set out on their latest mission.

attributes.title: Chapter 8
attributes.caption: Directions
attributes.description: The Reds and Caboose navigate a delicate situation with the help of a mysterious stranger

attributes.title: Chapter 9
attributes.caption: My House, From Here
attributes.description: Sarge, Grif and Caboose finally meet the face behind the mysterious voice.

attributes.title: Chapter 10
attributes.caption: Lay of the Land
attributes.description: The team discover more about their sandy new home.

attributes.title: Chapter 11
attributes.caption: Dumb Cop, Bad Cop
attributes.description: Caboose causes trouble for the Reds while Lopez causes motorcycles for Simmons.

attributes.title: Chapter 12
attributes.caption: Well Hello
attributes.description: Caboose's sneaky antics have aroused suspicion among the Desert dig team.

attributes.title: Chapter 13
attributes.caption: Called Up
attributes.description: Tucker brings the Reds up to speed. The Reds bring Tucker down to Earth.

attributes.title: Chapter 14
attributes.caption: The Installation
attributes.description: Simmons and Lopez try to hold their ground, while the desert team members find themselves in shifting sands.

attributes.title: Chapter 15
attributes.caption: Watch the Flank
attributes.description: Epsilon Church takes charge of the escalating situation at Sandtrap, while the reds back at Valhalla have their hands full.

attributes.title: Chapter 16
attributes.caption: Retention Deficit
attributes.description: Church is having a little trouble with the "out of the box" experience.

attributes.title: Chapter 17
attributes.caption: Trust Issues
attributes.description: Things start to shake up on Sandtrap, while the Reds at Valhalla spring into action.

attributes.title: Chapter 18
attributes.caption: Hang Time
attributes.description: Church learns that with great power, comes great responsibility... also a wicked left hook.

attributes.title: Chapter 19
attributes.caption: Think You Know Someone
attributes.description: The Valhalla squad continue their escape attempts while the Reds, Aliens and Caboose all chase after CT in a three-way race to get control of Epsilon.
